product_name: The North Face Momentum Jacket - Women's
long_description: This The North Face fleece jacket is a go-everywhere staple that you won't want to leave behind-wear it alone or underneath your shell parka. Made from lightweight TKA Stretch fabric, it has a smooth, non-pilling outer face, a warm fleecy inner face and comfortable four-way stretch. Repels light moisture and dries quickly when wet. Features full-front zipper with an inside windflap that doubles as a chin guard; tall collar keeps neck warm. Elastic-bound flexible cuffs. Features two handwarmer pockets and small shoulder pocket with hidden zippers. From the Flight Series(TM), developed by The North Face and tested by outdoor athletes; designed for done-in-a-day and weekend adventures.
short_description: This The North Face fleece jacket is a go-everywhere staple that you won't want to leave behind-wear it alone or underneath your shell parka.
